trans-unit.source: Represents information about a specific cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 특정 셀에 대 한 정보를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This structure provides information about the cell and the data item associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 이 구조는 셀과 셀과 연결 된 데이터 항목에 대 한 정보를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is used instead of a reference to the actual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> container when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> gets a cell; for example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 실제에 대 한 참조를 대신 사용 되며 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>컨테이너 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>; 셀을 가져올에서 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> 지정된 된 셀에 대 한 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor associates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with the specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자에 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>특정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>셀 컨테이너를 소유 하는 인스턴스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>

trans-unit.source: The cell for which information is to be generated.
trans-unit.target: 정보는 생성 되는 셀입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure using the specified data item and column.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> 지정한 데이터 항목 및 열을 사용 하 여 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not associate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with a specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 연결 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>특정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>인스턴스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 행에 대 한 데이터 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 개체가 현재 인스턴스와 같은지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This method compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 비교는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>셀 컨테이너를 소유 하는.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스와 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the comparison object represents the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>비교 개체가 나타내는 동일한 셀; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 현재에 대 한 해시 코드를 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the structure.
trans-unit.target: 구조에 대 한 해시 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the structure holds valid information.
trans-unit.target: 구조 유효한 정보를 포함 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property verifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property is not <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 확인 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>속성은 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structure has valid information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>구조에 올바른 정보를 포함 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 행에 대 한 데이터 항목을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 행에 대 한 데이터 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다 두 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> 인스턴스는 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자는 비교는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>셀 컨테이너를 소유 하는.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 첫 번째 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 두 번째 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>두 구조체가 동일한 셀을 나타내는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다 두 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> 인스턴스가 다른 지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자는 비교는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>셀 컨테이너를 소유 하는.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 첫 번째 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 두 번째 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures do not represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>두 구조체가 동일한 셀;를 나타내지 않는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
